summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Tap-to-Trade Price Blocks simulation app completed. All major features working correctly including real-time price updates, block arming/execution, trade logging, and visual effects.

minor_bugs.issue: Reset button may not completely clear trade log in some cases (1 trade remaining after reset)

passed_tests: Current price display updates in real time (₹2004-2010 range observed)
Price blocks grid renders with 48 blocks showing INR (₹) prices
Block states work correctly (IDLE → ARMED → EXECUTED/CANCELLED)
ARMED state achievable when simulation is paused
Cancel button (X) appears on armed blocks and works correctly
BUY/SELL toggle functions with visual feedback
Play/Pause button successfully pauses price simulation
Settings panel opens with volatility and tick rate sliders
Live chart renders with proper dimensions (1568x200px)
Auto-execution when price crosses armed block targets
Toast notifications show on trade execution
Trade log displays executed trades with P&L calculations
SELL orders work correctly with appropriate trigger logic
Dark theme with correct background colors (rgb(10, 5, 16))
Visual glow effects on armed blocks
Price distance indicators showing ↑/↓ with INR amounts
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Investigate why reset functionality occasionally leaves 1 trade in the log instead of clearing completely. All other features working excellently.
